body.title: How to integrate Castor with Maven

section.title: Introduction
section.p: Starting with Castor 1.0.4, the Castor team has started to make selected build artefacts of Castor available at the Codehaus Maven 2 repository.
To include Castor 1.0.4 (and future releases) in your Maven 2 project(s), please add the following Maven 2 dependency to your project POM.

section.title: Snapshot releases
section.p: As we are working towards new releases, we will try to make snapshot releases available as we make progress with existing/newly created Jira issues. Please consult with the relevant release section at the raodmap to get an idea what's been fixed as part of a (planned) release.
As usual, please report any issues with these Maven 2 (snapshot) releases through Jira.
